candidates.title: _document
points: Autonomous Cloud Automations
Features
Self‑Improving
Agents continuously analyze, invent, and evolve automations.
Repo Sync
Changes are committed and pushed automatically to main.
Zero Ops
Runs fully in the cloud—no servers or manual intervention.
Safety‑First
Conservative edits with logs, reports, and guardrails.
Scalable
Generates domain‑specific factories on demand.
